title: Bind for Temporarily Disabling Highlight?
question:
Hi,


When checking objects for fit, I wish I had a press-to-disable (not a toggle) way to temporarily hide the selection highlights. In other words, I select an object, do something to it like move it, and tank a look at it. This I want for the building process, so itâ€™s nothing that Bongo would work for.


Thanks for reading,

brenda

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino
import scriptcontext
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
    
def ToggleHighlight():
    ids = rs.SelectedObjects(include_lights=True, include_grips=False)
    if not ids: return
    
    objs = [rs.coercerhinoobject(i) for i in ids]
    for obj in objs:
        if obj.IsHighlighted(False): 
            obj.Highlight(False)
        else: 
            obj.Highlight(True)
    scriptcontext.doc.Views.Redraw()
    
ToggleHighlight()
